attributes.action: The UK Government should pressure The White House to release Bin Laden proof of death pictures
attributes.additional_details:
Osama Bin Laden masterminded terrorist attacks on the West and as result has seen our troops deployed alongside US and international forces fighting long wars and causing many wounded and fatalities.
Although the September 11th attacks targeted Americans, British and other nationalities were killed and families affected.
By signing this petition, we would like to see the Government pressure The White House into releasing the Bin Laden death pictures to the public. There is enough conspiracy theories about 9/11 as it is. Many of us would like to see this monster dead confirmed dead.
